title: 86 Prime Day Deals Under $100 (2024) to Shop Right Now
author: Audrey Lee, Blake Bakkila
byline: Audrey Lee, Blake Bakkila, Soleil Summer
excerpt: Prime Day deals under $100 ; tech: Apple AirPods (was $169, now $130); JBL Clip 5 (was $80, now $60); kitchen: Keurig K-Mini (was $100, now $60)
text: If you’re anything like us, then you appreciate a good deal. In other words, searching for the best Prime Day deals under $100 is our time to shine.If you’re wondering exactly what’s worth buying during this year's Amazon Prime Big Deal Days, you’re in luck. We don’t want you to feel any FOMO when it comes to the sales extravaganza, so we’ve combed through the promotions in search of the best home deals under $100 you can scoop up. True to form, Amazon has the best prices on their top-rated cookware, cult-favorite kitchen appliances (including the Instant Pot and countless air fryers), home decor, and tech deals (like Bluetooth smart speakers, robot vacuums, and air purifiers)—all under $100.If you’re looking to come out of this year’s Prime Day sales event smelling like a rose, consider this your cheat sheet (but don't dilly dally—the sale ends today). In addition to an unbeatable price point, the below selections boast rave reviews and five-star ratings (AKA you'll want to act fast). Plus, you can also read more about our Amazon favorites, review our top choices for Prime Day deals on furniture, mattresses, sheets, and bath towels too.Top picks:Furniture: Yaheetech Metal Bed Frame (was $140, now $70)Air purifiers: BLUEAIR Mini Air Purifier (was $70, now $65)Smart home and tech: Apple AirPods (3rd Generation) (was $169, now $130)Kitchen appliances: Bissell 1782 Pet Cordless Hand and Car Vacuum (was $70, now $62)Coffee makers: Keurig K-Mini Plus 12 oz Coffee Maker (was $100, now $57)Shop The Best Prime Day Deals Under $100 By Category:Furniture under $100Decor under $100Air purifiers under $100Amazon devices, smart home, and tech deals under $100Kitchen appliances under $100Coffee makers under $100Bath and beauty under $100Organizer deals under $100Bedding and sleep deals under $100Best Amazon Prime Day deals under $100: FurnitureScouting out the best Amazon Prime furniture that’s both stylish and affordable can definitely feel like an endless scroll, which is why we’ve gone ahead and done the work for you. Whether you’re looking for a home office upgrade in the form of a sturdy desk, some extra storage, or in the mood to switch up your bedroom furniture, we've got prime members covered on the best furniture deals under $100.Yaheetech Mid-Century Modern Upholstered ChairFortunately, you don’t need to spend a fortune on mid-century modern furniture. Popular Amazon brand Yaheetech makes this button-tufted accent chair with polyester upholstery or faux leather, and all but one style is on sale for Prime Day.LUE BONA Faux Leather Vanity StoolMake a statement with this heavily marked down faux leather vanity stool. The whiskey brown color is currently 69% for Prime Day, but the gray and black upholstered stools are also discounted.Vasagle Ekho Bar Stools (Set of 2)Update your bar with a new set of stools, available in two heights (24.8 inches for counter height or 30 inches for bar height). The faux leather black stools are 25% off in the counter height style.Colamy Velvet OttomanDoubling as an art piece, this ottoman is one-of-a-kind — and up to 20% off. We love the green version (shown here), but the camel upholstered ottoman is also 15% off right now.Brafab Shoe CabinetStoring shoes is sort of chic, thanks to this cabinet, which holds up to 12 pairs of shoes. In lieu of open shelving we often see in entryways, the console has drawers that open and close to conceal your shoes, too. The black two-drawer style is 15% off right now, and you can save an additional 8% when you apply the attached coupon.Yaheetech Mid-Century Modern ArmchairBouclé is an on-trend, soft-to-the-touch fabric we can’t get enough of, and this upholstered chair is nearly half off for Prime Day (Bonus: you can apply a 10% off coupon, too!). If you’re more into faux leather, they also have one that’s 22% off.Yaheetech Console Table with DrawerNeed a bit more storage in your entryway or living room? This popular console table comes with a drawer and two open shelves, and it’s made in several wood stains. Rustic brown is 30% off, or you can save 15% off at checkout when you purchase the light oak (pictured here) or 10% off if you buy the gray version.Yaheetech Metal Bed FrameThis farmhouse-inspired bed frame can be at your door by this weekend, and it’s marked down in the twin, twin XL, full, queen, and king size. Reviewers say it’s the perfect combination of sturdy and stylish.Amztabler Standing DeskStanding desks are all the rage these days, and if you’ve been thinking about it, you can snag this one for a whopping 89% off. It’s discounted in black or “Rustic” (a dark wooden desktop).PUKAMI Cross Legged Office ChairFor nearly half off, this beige office chair will instantly add comfort and style to your WFH setup. People love the wide seat, height adjustability, and wide range of colors to choose from (many of which are marked down!).Best Amazon Prime Day deals under $100: DecorWhile it may take some digging, Amazon’s home decor section has some impressive gems—including mid century silhouettes and bauhaus designs. For Prime Day 2024, you can cozy up your space with a new light fixture or upgrade your throw pillow game for less than $100.Livabliss Hapsburg Moroccan Shag Area RugArea rugs provide texture and can really tie a room together, and this popular boho rug comes with more than 4,500 five-star reviews on Amazon thanks to its plush pile that’s surprisingly easy to vacuum. We’re partial to the ultra-neutral beige, which is marked down the most at 73% off.Loloi Chris Loves Julia x Polly Runner RugFor a more modern option, consider this rug by Loloi in collaboration with DIY experts Chris and Julia Marcum. There are several patterns and sizes, too, and most are on sale for up to 64% off.BEAUTYPEAK Arch Floor MirrorArched mirrors are the subtle addition that adds curves and character to any room. This 65 x 24-inch one can be hung up or lean on a wall, and it’s now 45% off. There are other styles available from the brand, including options with gold and silver frames and rounded corners.Creative Co-Op Stoneware BowlAlso from Creative Co-Op, this stoneware bowl is discounted in both black and white. It measures 3.75 x 8 inches, so it’s the perfect serving bowl to display food for guests or many use it as a standalone decor piece in their home.TIMEFOTO Flower VaseYour farmer’s market flower haul will look even more beautiful when you place it in this green glass vase. Come December, it’ll also coordinate with any red and green decor in your home, too.FUNSOBA Green Glass Flower VaseHere’s another green glass vase on our radar. Both the large and small size are on sale during Prime Day, so you can purchase one or both to create levels with your next floral design.SNUGACE Black Vanity MirrorSimple and chic, this 30 x 36-inch rectangular vanity mirror with a black frame is now 29% off. Hang it horizontally or vertically to suit your space, and rest assured that it comes with a three-year warranty if you run into any issues. Two other styles are on sale, too: the 24 x 36-inch rectangular mirror with a gold frame (50%), and the 30-inch round mirror with a black frame (32% off).Creative Co-Op Round Hammered Metal BowlThe best-selling decorative bowls on Amazon are on sale now, and you can spend less than $20 on them right now. The copper finish option is 53% off.Best Amazon Prime Day deals under $100: air purifiersCombatting airborne dust, dander, and allergens is easy when you have a top-of-the-line filtration device. And though clean air is a must in 2024, we don’t think it should come at great expense to your wallet. In addition to countless highly rated purifiers for larger spaces, we found multiple buys for under $100 from top brands like Blueair, Levoit, and more.Dreo Tower FanWith four speeds and a sleep mode, this is a quiet yet mighty tower fan you can set for up to 8 hours. All four colors are on sale, but the black option is the best bang for your buck at 15% off.Pomoron 4-in-1 Air PurifierThis air purifier does a little bit of everything, acting as an air ionizer, HEPA filter, UV light, and diffuser to amp up your aromatherapy game. It also has three timer settings (8, 12, or 24 hours) and four fan speeds, and a 25dB sleep mode (essentially the same level of sound as someone breathing a few feet away from you).Blueair Mini Air PurifierDon’t let the small size of this air purifier fool you. Backed by more than 6,500 five-star reviews, it measures 11 x 6.8 inches but can clean up 223 square feet of space in just 30 minutes. Fair warning: It’s corded, so it’s not quite as portable as it might look.Fulminare H13 True HEPA Air PurifierThis air purifier is even smaller than the Blueair Mini, measuring 5.5 x 7 inches. The night mode is ultra-convenient, too, with a 24dB low fan setting, five timer options, and the nightlight. It’s an impressive 20% off in white, or 25% off when you purchase a two-pack in black.Bissell Air180 Air PurifierWe think this BISSELL purifier is a perfect Prime Day get. It uses a three-in-one filter to evenly distribute clean airflow in spaces up to 1372 square feet once per hour.Fulminare H13 True HEPA Air PurifierIf Instant’s air purification systems are anything like the brand’s pressure cookers, then we’re willing to test the waters.Best Amazon Prime Day deals under $100: Amazon devices, smart home, and Prime Day tech dealsNo need to wait until Black Friday to snag some tech gadgets. Take this as a sign to shop top-notch smart home devices right now—and at under $100 a pop, no less. Apple earbuds with noise cancellation (that aren't technically under $100 but still a great deal!), Samsung smart TVs, Ring video doorbells, Alexa-enabled Amazon Echo Dots, and the Amazon Fire TV stick are all discounted right now, with the retailer offering some of the lowest prices we’ve seen on lots of other gems too. Think a Wi-Fi enabled security camera, Kindle e-reader, an Anker power bank to lengthen your phone’s battery life, and more—no coupon needed.Tapo by TP-Link Smart Plug Mini (3-Pack)Prone to leaving the lights on? These smart plugs that can be voice controlled through the Tapo app help control your lights and other pluggable devices while you're away.Amazon Echo Show 5 (3rd Gen)It wouldn't be APD without an Echo—use it to set your morning alarm or to play your favorite tunes.Apple AirPods (3rd Generation) Wireless Ear BudsOf course you could also opt for the pocket-sized Apple AirPods that can connect to your iPhone, Ipad, and even Apple Watch to take your favorite audio from the gym to your morning commute.Blink Video DoorbellNever miss another package again with this video doorbell that will alert you to any movement on your doorstep.Tapo by TP-Link 2K QHD Indoor/Outdoor Security CameraHere's an outdoor security camera to ensure nothing goes awry while you're at work or on vacation.Roku Streaming Stick 4K Streaming DeviceTake your favorite streaming channels with you wherever, whenever with the very portable Roku streaming stick.BluuSuuk Tablet Floor StandWatch your fave shows while lying in bed or even in the tub with this handy tablet stand.JBL Clip 5 Waterproof Portable SpeakerBecome the hero of every hot weather hang with this portable JBL that's waterproof and has five hours of battery life.Anker 622 Magnetic Battery (MagGo)A trusty Anker charger will ensure your phone is always at close to 100%.Soundcore by Anker P20i True Wireless EarbudsAt half their original price, these budget-friendly wireless earbuds from Anker might make nice backups should anything happen to your go-tos.Sony MDR-ZX310AP ZX HeadphonesBut if you like listening to your music privately, this pair or headphones with bluetooth connectivity is the way to go.Anker Nano ChargerIn times of dire straits (AKA when your phone falls to the dreaded 1%) this Anker plug will become an MVP purchase.Best Prime Day deals under $100: Kitchen appliancesMaybe you’ve finally succumbed to the Instant Pot lifestyle or are simply in the mood to upgrade your food processor—either way Amazon will never let you down with their seemingly endless supply of kitchen deals. The site is stocked with dozens of top-rated air fryers (like the below sleek select from Bella), plus every brand of blender, coffee maker, slow cooker, and toaster oven under the sun. Not to mention the high quality selects below will run you less than $100.Ninja BN401 Nutri Pro Compact Personal BlenderWe see fresh pesto and seasonal smoothies in your future with this personal blender from Ninja.BELLA Air Fryer Oven and 5-in-1 MulticookerIf you're in the market for an air fryer, we recommend this stylish-looking design that's available in chic navy blue, red, white, and black.Bissell Pet Hair Eraser Cordless Hand VacuumYou might already be set with a full-size Dyson, but this hand held vacuum is a great option for the couch cushions, car seats, or any other hard-to-reach nooks and crannies.OXO Good Grips Stainless Steel Salad SpinnerA salad spinner is one of those purchases you'll really appreciate when the big cooking holidays start to roll around. This sturdy design from OXO is nearly 25% off.Le Creuset Stoneware Mini Round CocotteLe Creuset is a beloved cookware brand that makes stunning enamel cast iron pieces worth investing in for your home. Snag this mini cocotte from the brand to roast garlic and serve modest amounts of French onion soup in.Elyese Ceramic Bowls (Set of 6)You can never have too many tiny bowls around your home. Use them when cooking to hold spices and seasoning, place on your foyer console table to drop loose change in, or keep them in the bedroom to display your jewelry.Lodge L8SK3 10-1/4-Inch Pre-Seasoned SkilletYou could also pick up an extra durable cast iron pan that only gets better with age.Joyzy Motion Sensor LightOne cost-effective way to level-up your kitchen space? Sticking lights underneath your upper-cabinets. It easily and quickly adds an air of refinement to your space with very little effort or money. This one is dimmable and sticks to surfaces using magnets.OTOTO Elizabat Kitchen ScissorsOctober marks the unofficial start of spooky season, meaning these batty shears will make cooking everyday meals feel slightly festive.Exluvon Fridge DeodorizerWe know more than a few of you could use this top-rated fridge deodorizer to help combat the smell of last week's takeout leftovers.Thetchry Checkered Wood Cutting BoardUpgrade your cutting board to this butcher block-style design in a trendy checkerboard pattern. It's made of solid walnut and features gilded handles that make it ideal for prep stages but nice enough for meal time.Fellow Clyde Electric KettleIf you favor a more analog approach to brewing tea, then you might like this Scandi-esque kettle from Fellow. Fellow's often recognized for their elegant goosenecked electric kettles, but this stout model will look equally as stylish on your stovetop.OTOTO Mon Cherry Measuring Spoons & Egg SeparatorWith homemade pumpkin pies, seasonal fruit tarts, and a flight of fresh-baked cookies in tow, we think this very charming measuring-spoon set from Amazon's sale is an especially smart buy.CAROTE 11pcs Nonstick Cookware SetThis 11-piece set in all white is just the thing to add some sophistication to the kitchen.Best Prime Day deals under $100: Coffee makersLooking for a way to upgrade your daily caffeine rituals? From a sleek Keurig find to a tried-and-true gem from Mr. Coffee, you can always expect Amazon Prime Day to be brimming with top-rated coffee makers under $100. Act fast—you can currently upgrade your morning brew for as low as $60 right now.Keurig K-Mini Single Serve Coffee MakerThis mini Keurig is slim enough to work in even the most crowded kitchen tops. Though you could also keep it desk-handy to keep the caffeine flowing.Black + Decker Programmable CoffeemakerHere's a Black + Decker 12-cup model that'll make enough for the whole family. You can also change the brew strength depending on your taste.Ninja Pods & Grounds Specialty Single-Serve Coffee MakerAvailable in three neutral colors, this sleek-looking Ninja is equipped with four brew options and a milk frother.Ninja Programmable XL 14-Cup Coffee Maker PROPerfect whether you want a small or large batch of morning roast, this copper Ninja has a plate warmer to keep your coffee piping hot for up to four hours.Ninja 12-Cup Programmable Coffee MakerThis programmable Ninja lets you preschedule your cups of joe—meaning you can always have a fresh pot ready when it's time for a coffee break.Amaste Drip Coffee MakerThis coffee maker looks way more luxe than its under-$100 price tag. And it's available in fun shades like this matcha green and ruby red.Instant Cold Brew Coffee MakerA refreshing cup of cold brew is just under 20 minutes away thanks to this handy Instant gadget.Keurig K-Slim Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee MakerYet another mini Keurig that earns its place on cluttered counters. Pop in your favorite pod and start your morning in style.Best Prime Day deals under $100: Bath and beauty dealsSometimes the smallest details can make a big difference—like an extra nice hand soap or a well-organized shower caddy. Luckily, Prime Day has plenty of on-sale items to bring your bathroom at home up to spa-level. We've gathered some of the best deals on trending men and women's skincare, shower and sink organizers, plus a supposed Olaplex dupe.Al-Jamal Palestinian Olive Oil Soap Bar (Set of 6)Families have been using this gentle olive oil soap for generations, and it’s gentle enough for sensitive skin and hair — one happy reviewer even shared, “I was shocked when I applied this soap to feel my hair turn into silk.”AOJEZOR Toilet Paper Holder StandIf there’s one thing we could all use, it’s more storage. This toilet paper holder stand was designed for small spaces, measuring 6.7 x 6.7 x 30 inches. It comes with a spot for your toilet paper, a hidden storage space so you have extra rolls on hand, plus two shelves to display candles, Potpourri, and anything else you might need.Bio-Oil Skincare OilKnown for reducing the appearance of stretch marks and acne scars, Bio-Oil is a holy grail product. For a limited time, you can get 21% off when you bundle the popular oil with the brand’s popular Dry Skin Gel moisturizer.Elizavecca Hair TreatmentWe all want shiny, smooth hair, but sometimes, that comes at a price. That’s why many people who have tried and loved the Olaplex system are calling this the ultimate dupe. With more than 36,000 five-star reviews, reviewers have been amazed by how their hair looks and feels better even after their first use.Oral-B iO Deep Clean Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush BundleThere’s no better time to score Amazon’s best-selling rotating power toothbrush, which is 40% off during Prime Day. As a bonus, your purchase comes with two brush heads and a handy travel case.Waterpik Cordless Advanced 2.0 Water FlosserBy now, you’ve probably heard about how the Waterpik has revolutionized at-home dental care. The water flosser isn’t cheap, though, which is why you should add it to your cart now that it’s 40% off.Paradmas Cherry Toilet Brush (Set of 2)Let’s be honest, toilet bowl brushes are often eyesores in your bathroom — until now. This shockingly adorable cherry toilet brush set offers a whimsical, colorful take on a boring bathroom staple. And right now, it’s 15% off when you use the attached coupon.Revlon One-Step Hair Dryer and StylerEveryone knows about the viral REVLON One-Step Volumizer Hair Dryer and Styler, but this paddle brush-style alternative is backed by even more five-star reviews (47,723, to be exact!). It’s currently 42% off, so it’s well worth the investment in a product many say smooths curly, coarse hair and cuts their drying time in half.The Laundress Glass & Mirror CleanerA bunch of The Laundress' luxurious cleaning products are on sale this Prime Day, like this glass and mirror cleaner that leaves surfaces sparkling and streak-free.Amika The Kure Intense Bond Repair Hair MaskThis reparative mask will revitalize your hair—just in time for holiday party season. It also reduces breakage, prevents damage, and strengthens strands with its nourishing ingredients.Apotheke 2-Wick Canvas Scented CandleWe love Apotheke's soothing scents, and luckily for us (and you), several of the brand's votives are discounted right now.Dorai Home Bath Stone MatUnlike some terry cloth and tufted design, this quick-dry stone bath mat is easy to clean and won't attract odors.Best Prime Day deals under $100: Organizer dealsLooking for a place to store your Carrie Bradshaw-level shoe collection? Prime Day is an excellent time to invest in a spare clothing rack or maybe a something that can hold your robust skincare routine. We've scoped out the best organizers that'll help you feel like your've got your life together—like a few kitchen accessories that will take some of the guesswork out of finding a fork and an all-in-one wardrobe replacement that to help you forget your apartment is lacking closet space.Tribesigns 3-in-1 Entryway Hall Tree with DrawerPart-shoe rack, part-coat rack, this all-handy storage solution even has a built-in overhead shelf to put anything from spare throw blankets to extra mittens.Simple Houseware Garment Rack with Storage ShelvesNo closet, no problem—this streamlined clothing rack even has a few hooks to hang garments and bags should you be running low on hangers.Water Bottle OrganizerNever grab the wrong Stanley cup or Hydroflask ever again with this slim water bottle tower that can hold up to 12 beveragePipishell Bamboo Expandable Drawer Organizer for UtensilsAll your utensils will have a place in this expandable organizer designed to make setting the dinner table easy peasy.Pipishell Slim Storage Cart with WheelsKeep precious La Mer and SKII products safely tucked in this rollable cart that's a smart storage solution if your bathroom is seriously lacking in cabinet space.Hamitor Corner Shower Caddy with Tension PoleHow about this shower tower to make your shower routine more streamlined? With this handy accessory you'll never run out of room for all your favorite hair masks and body scrubs.Best Prime Day deals under $100: Bedding and sleepIn case you didn’t know, some of the best sheets we own come from Amazon. Since we’re strong believers that you don’t have to shell out big bucks for high-quality linens for your guest bath or bedroom, these picks should help. From pillows and duvet inserts to 100% cotton sheets and top-notch comforters, you can give your entire home a linen refresh in a single day (or even a few hours).Waowoo Adult Weighted Blanket Queen SizeWeighted blankets are ideal for anxious sleepers to settle down for the night—scoop this one up for a nice discount while you can.Utopia Bedding Comforter Duvet InsertYou could place this quilted duvet insert inside one of our highly recommended covers, though we think it's nice enough to stand on its own, too.Qutool Cooling Pillows (Set of 2)A very cooling bed pillow should help you through those sweaty nights. They're filled with shredded memory foam and suitable for all types of sleepers.Sleep Zone Nanotex Cooling Comforter SetDuvets and comforters are nice and all, but we really encourage people to not sleep (no pun intended) on a nice, breezy quilt. This one is available in two shades of grey and comes with two pillowcases—all for under $60.Mellanni Bed Sheet SetWhen we covered the Most-Reviewed Sheets on Amazon from Mellanni in 2019, they had 60,000 reviews–nearly 75% of them 5 stars. As of today, they've received more than 230,000; clearly their customers remain impressed by both the price point and the lifetime warrantyCasper Pillow (Set of 2)Pair your new Casper mattress with a matching pillow from the brand. This pair has a 100% cotton cover and microfiber fill for increased airflow while you sleep.California Design Den 400-Thread-Count 100% Cotton Sheet SetThere’s nothing quite like the look of crisp white cotton sheets. Best of all, you can snag this set at a discount during Prime Day.Zinus Swirl Gel Cooling Memory Foam Mattress TopperHot sleepers, rejoice! The unique memory foam in this mattress topper promotes airflow, making it easier to stay cool at night.Zinus 4-Inch Green Tea Memory Foam Mattress TopperOr if you’re experiencing aches and pains, consider the brand’s green tea extract-infused mattress topper. It conforms to your body and is designed to help relieve pressure while you sleep.Amazon Basics Lightweight Microfiber Sheet SetIs it time to refresh those sheets? These best-selling ones from Amazon have an impressive 347,000-plus five-star reviews.
html:
If you’re anything like us, then you appreciate a good deal. In other words, searching for the best Prime Day deals under $100 is our time to shine.

If you’re wondering exactly what’s worth buying during this year's Amazon Prime Big Deal Days, you’re in luck. We don’t want you to feel any FOMO when it comes to the sales extravaganza, so we’ve combed through the promotions in search of the best home deals under $100 you can scoop up. True to form, Amazon has the best prices on their top-rated cookware, cult-favorite kitchen appliances (including the Instant Pot and countless air fryers), home decor, and tech deals (like Bluetooth smart speakers, robot vacuums, and air purifiers)—all under $100.

If you’re looking to come out of this year’s Prime Day sales event smelling like a rose, consider this your cheat sheet (but don't dilly dally—the sale ends today). In addition to an unbeatable price point, the below selections boast rave reviews and five-star ratings (AKA you'll want to act fast). Plus, you can also read more about our Amazon favorites, review our top choices for Prime Day deals on furniture, mattresses, sheets, and bath towels too.

Top picks:

  • Furniture: Yaheetech Metal Bed Frame (was $140, now $70)
  • Air purifiers: BLUEAIR Mini Air Purifier (was $70, now $65)
  • Smart home and tech: Apple AirPods (3rd Generation) (was $169, now $130)
  • Kitchen appliances: Bissell 1782 Pet Cordless Hand and Car Vacuum (was $70, now $62)
  • Coffee makers: Keurig K-Mini Plus 12 oz Coffee Maker (was $100, now $57)

Shop The Best Prime Day Deals Under $100 By Category:

  • Furniture under $100
  • Decor under $100
  • Air purifiers under $100
  • Amazon devices, smart home, and tech deals under $100
  • Kitchen appliances under $100
  • Coffee makers under $100
  • Bath and beauty under $100
  • Organizer deals under $100
  • Bedding and sleep deals under $100

Best Amazon Prime Day deals under $100: Furniture

Scouting out the best Amazon Prime furniture that’s both stylish and affordable can definitely feel like an endless scroll, which is why we’ve gone ahead and done the work for you. Whether you’re looking for a home office upgrade in the form of a sturdy desk, some extra storage, or in the mood to switch up your bedroom furniture, we've got prime members covered on the best furniture deals under $100.

Yaheetech Mid-Century Modern Upholstered Chair

Fortunately, you don’t need to spend a fortune on mid-century modern furniture. Popular Amazon brand Yaheetech makes this button-tufted accent chair with polyester upholstery or faux leather, and all but one style is on sale for Prime Day.

LUE BONA Faux Leather Vanity Stool

Make a statement with this heavily marked down faux leather vanity stool. The whiskey brown color is currently 69% for Prime Day, but the gray and black upholstered stools are also discounted.

Vasagle Ekho Bar Stools (Set of 2)

Update your bar with a new set of stools, available in two heights (24.8 inches for counter height or 30 inches for bar height). The faux leather black stools are 25% off in the counter height style.

Colamy Velvet Ottoman

Doubling as an art piece, this ottoman is one-of-a-kind — and up to 20% off. We love the green version (shown here), but the camel upholstered ottoman is also 15% off right now.

Brafab Shoe Cabinet

Storing shoes is sort of chic, thanks to this cabinet, which holds up to 12 pairs of shoes. In lieu of open shelving we often see in entryways, the console has drawers that open and close to conceal your shoes, too. The black two-drawer style is 15% off right now, and you can save an additional 8% when you apply the attached coupon.

Yaheetech Mid-Century Modern Armchair

Bouclé is an on-trend, soft-to-the-touch fabric we can’t get enough of, and this upholstered chair is nearly half off for Prime Day (Bonus: you can apply a 10% off coupon, too!). If you’re more into faux leather, they also have one that’s 22% off.

Yaheetech Console Table with Drawer

Need a bit more storage in your entryway or living room? This popular console table comes with a drawer and two open shelves, and it’s made in several wood stains. Rustic brown is 30% off, or you can save 15% off at checkout when you purchase the light oak (pictured here) or 10% off if you buy the gray version.

Yaheetech Metal Bed Frame

This farmhouse-inspired bed frame can be at your door by this weekend, and it’s marked down in the twin, twin XL, full, queen, and king size. Reviewers say it’s the perfect combination of sturdy and stylish.

Amztabler Standing Desk

Standing desks are all the rage these days, and if you’ve been thinking about it, you can snag this one for a whopping 89% off. It’s discounted in black or “Rustic” (a dark wooden desktop).

PUKAMI Cross Legged Office Chair

For nearly half off, this beige office chair will instantly add comfort and style to your WFH setup. People love the wide seat, height adjustability, and wide range of colors to choose from (many of which are marked down!).

Best Amazon Prime Day deals under $100: Decor

While it may take some digging, Amazon’s home decor section has some impressive gems—including mid century silhouettes and bauhaus designs. For Prime Day 2024, you can cozy up your space with a new light fixture or upgrade your throw pillow game for less than $100.

Livabliss Hapsburg Moroccan Shag Area Rug

Area rugs provide texture and can really tie a room together, and this popular boho rug comes with more than 4,500 five-star reviews on Amazon thanks to its plush pile that’s surprisingly easy to vacuum. We’re partial to the ultra-neutral beige, which is marked down the most at 73% off.

Loloi Chris Loves Julia x Polly Runner Rug

For a more modern option, consider this rug by Loloi in collaboration with DIY experts Chris and Julia Marcum. There are several patterns and sizes, too, and most are on sale for up to 64% off.

BEAUTYPEAK Arch Floor Mirror

Arched mirrors are the subtle addition that adds curves and character to any room. This 65 x 24-inch one can be hung up or lean on a wall, and it’s now 45% off. There are other styles available from the brand, including options with gold and silver frames and rounded corners.

Creative Co-Op Stoneware Bowl

Also from Creative Co-Op, this stoneware bowl is discounted in both black and white. It measures 3.75 x 8 inches, so it’s the perfect serving bowl to display food for guests or many use it as a standalone decor piece in their home.

TIMEFOTO Flower Vase

Your farmer’s market flower haul will look even more beautiful when you place it in this green glass vase. Come December, it’ll also coordinate with any red and green decor in your home, too.

FUNSOBA Green Glass Flower Vase

Here’s another green glass vase on our radar. Both the large and small size are on sale during Prime Day, so you can purchase one or both to create levels with your next floral design.

SNUGACE Black Vanity Mirror

Simple and chic, this 30 x 36-inch rectangular vanity mirror with a black frame is now 29% off. Hang it horizontally or vertically to suit your space, and rest assured that it comes with a three-year warranty if you run into any issues. Best Amazon Prime Day deals under $100: air purifiers

In addition to countless highly rated purifiers for larger spaces, we found multiple buys for under $100 from top brands like Blueair, Levoit, and more.

This air purifier does a little bit of everything, acting as an air ionizer, HEPA filter, UV light, and diffuser to amp up your aromatherapy game. It also has three timer settings (8, 12, or 24 hours) and four fan speeds, and a 25dB sleep mode (essentially the same level of sound as someone breathing a few feet away from you).

Fulminare H13 True HEPA Air Purifier
